content.value:
Welcome to Hotel Casa Isla de Manga, your home in Cartagena!

Hotel Casa Isla de Manga Policies & Conditions:

Cancellation policy: 72h before arrival.
Payments upon arrival: cash, credit and debit cards. This property may pre-authorise your card before arrival.

Check in: 14:00 PM
Check out: 13:00 PM

-Breakfast not included.
-Taxes not included - 16.00%

General:
-Reception open 24 hours.
-No curfew.
-Child friendly.
Non smoking.
-

description.description: Welcome to Hotel Casa Isla de Manga, your home in Cartagena! The Hotel is located in the Manga neighborhood, 2 minutes from the Port of Cartagena, 5 minutes from the bay of Cartagena and 5 minutes from the historic center by car and 10 minutes walking through the bay, in this tour we find the tourist pier and the Pastelillo Fort, We also found the Caribe Plaza shopping center Cerro de la Popa and Castillo de San Felipe, just 5 and 10 minutes respectively
